name: Grasshopper (Brysonic)
description:
Simple, Frogger-esque game, but you click and drag the grasshopper to move (sort of like Angry Birds). It starts out easy but the difficulty ramps up quite a bit after level 5! 

I've just recently started learning game development with Godot and this is my first project. Feedback is very welcome. Feel free to use the comments or Twitter: @brysonic

P.S. Leave a comment to tell me how far you were able to get! I've never managed to get past level 13 myself.
